哥們.definition: Brothers!; brethren; dude (colloquial); brother (diminutive form of address between males)

哥們兒.definition: erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]

哥倫布.definition: Cristóbal Colón or Christopher Columbus (1451-1506); Columbus, capital of Ohio

哥倫比亞.definition: Colombia; Columbia (District of, or University etc)

哥倫比亞大學.pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Da4 xue2

哥倫比亞廣播公司.pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1

哥倫比亞特區.pinyin: Ge1 lun2 bi3 ya4 te4 qu1

哥尼斯堡.definition: Königsberg, Baltic port city, capital of East Prussia (until WWII)

哥德巴赫猜想.pinyin: Ge1 de2 ba1 he4 cai1 xiang3
哥德巴赫猜想.definition: the Goldbach conjecture in number theory

哥打巴魯.definition: Kota Bharu, city in Malaysia on border with Thailand, capital of Kelantan sultanate

哥本哈根.definition: Copenhagen or København, capital of Denmark

哥林多前書.definition: First epistle of St Paul to the Corinthians

哥林多後書.definition: Second Epistle of St Paul to the Corinthians

哥白尼.definition: Mikolaj Kopernik or Nicolaus Copernicus (1473-1543), Polish astronomer, mathematician and polymath

哥老會.definition: late-Qing underground resistance movement against the Qing dynasty
